articles.title: Questions remain after county releases reports on Hudson jail deaths
articles.description: Five inmates have died in the jail's custody since June.

articles.author: Terrence T. McDonald | The Jersey Journal
articles.title: Questions remain after county releases reports on Hudson jail deaths, medical care
articles.description: Two recently released reports shed the barest of light on the situation at Hudson County's jail as county officials probe the deaths of five inmates in the last eight months.

articles.title: Plan to close Mercer County jail heating up again, union says
articles.description: The corrections officers' union says the jail is not falling apart and Mercer County should drop the plan

articles.title: Medical treatment at jail under fire from former detainee
articles.description: Attorneys for an immigrant originally from the Dominican Republic are the latest to lob accusations of shoddy medical care at the Hudson County jail and urge the county to make "broad changes" to a facility that has seen at least six inmate deaths in the last…

articles.title: Medical treatment at Hudson County jail under fire from former detainee
articles.description: The man says he did not receive chemotherapy until 16 months after he first complained of pain.

articles.author: Kelly Heyboer | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: From maggots to 'suicide rooms,' inside N.J.'s immigrant detention centers
articles.description: Asylum seekers and other immigrants in New Jersey detention facilities complain about bad food, dirty water and inadequate medical care, according to a new report.

articles.author: Star-Ledger Editorial Board
articles.title: Christie's most positive legacy: criminal justice reform | Editorial
articles.description: His epiphany: The war on drugs was a catastrophic failure, and many reforms start from admitting that much.
